retainqueue.description: If the queue should be cleared or not when everyone leaves the voice channel

prefix.description: The prefix for the normal chat commands

musicchannel.description: The channel where the music commands should be used

animenotifychannel.description: The channel where the anime notifications should be sent

animenotifyschedule.description: The schedule for the anime notifications

add.description: Add a new anime to the list

remove.description: Remove an anime from the list

list.description: List all the anime in the list

animenotify.description: Add, remove or list anime to be notified when they are released

retain.description: Wheter or not to retain the queue
